entries.title: Test
entries.body: This is a test to see if new posts are properly pushed to json-server. First test after code creation.

entries.title: Test #3
entries.body: Lets just see if refreshing database info strategy is working.

entries.title: Refactor to 'entry'
entries.body: We have refactored to use 'entry' terminology instead of 'post'. 'Post' can be confused with an REST POST request. It also implies something more public than what we are trying to do here. As this is intended for more personal use, 'entry' felt more apt.
